attributes.action: Resolve the expenses issue with immediate effect and get back to real work, in particular ensuring the banks recommence supporting our businesses so that Britain can get back to work!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My husband has been in business for nearly two years as a sub-contractor in Environmental/Civil Engineering sector, employing four hard-working young men.  He sub-contracts to a larger, family owned award winning contractor, who has a full order book, but cannot commence their new contracts for 09/10 due to lack of financial support from their bank. We will go out of business if he has to support his staff much longer, with no work and no income, resulting in another five people on the 
unemployment register.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
